benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: PUT /1.0/kb/bundles/{bundleId}/pause - Pause a bundle

covered: PUT - Valid Request coverage: TC01-TC05 cover core pause behavior with required and optional parameters (204/204 and state transition to paused) and various parameter combinations
Non-Existing Resource coverage: TC07 and TC20 cover 404 responses when bundle does not exist or database is empty
Authorization coverage: TC10 (missing X-Killbill-CreatedBy header) and TC11 (unauthorized user) cover 400/401 error handling

Input Validation and Security coverage: TC06 (invalid bundleId format), TC13 (SQL injection in bundleId), TC14 (XSS payload in headers), TC17 (requestedDate in the past), TC18 (malformed requestedDate), TC19 (malformed pluginProperty)
Parameter and Payload handling coverage: TC03 (pluginProperty), TC04 (all optional headers), TC15 (extra parameters ignored), TC16 (very large pluginProperty array)
State handling coverage: TC08 (paused state) and TC09 (canceled state) cover invalid state responses
Concurrency coverage: TC21 tests concurrent PUT requests and ensures correct behavior
Performance/Load coverage: TC22 checks performance under load
Regression/Integration coverage: TC23 (regression - unrelated bundles), TC24 (special characters in pluginProperty), TC25 (dependent plugin service down), TC26 (data consistency across systems)
Accessibility coverage: TC27 verifies API documentation accessibility and readability
Audit logging coverage: TC04 confirms reason/comment are logged where provided
gaps: Partial Update semantics: no explicit test enforcing full vs partial PUT payload behavior
Caching behavior tests: no ETag/Cache-Control validation
403 Forbidden scenario: no test for authorized users with insufficient permissions
Internal Server Error (500) scenario: no test for 500-level failures
Additional edge-case coverage: not all potential edge inputs (e.g., complex invalid headers) are exhaustively tested
recommendations: Add 403 Forbidden test to cover insufficient permissions for a user, reinforcing authorization checks
Add 500 Internal Server Error scenario to validate handling of DB/service failures
Add rate-limiting/throttling tests to verify behavior under burst load
Add caching header validations (ETag/Cache-Control) to confirm caching behavior
Add explicit test for partial PUT semantics to confirm whether partial payloads are allowed or rejected
Expand edge-case coverage with more header/pluginProperty variations and boundary conditions
